data.text: Dòun zunuiti, à woilo ɠɛɛɠɛ lɛnɛ gooiti ma,
Nà kala pagɔ veezu wo ya,
Gè ɠɛni kɛ̀ɛ ya, ga doun zunu ɠilagi,
Kɛ̀ɛ ɠɛni kàlasu, é ɗa ɠɛ mà:
Ɠimalai ɠaiziɛ, ta keleɠelegi,
Mina ɠɛlɛ ɠimalai ʋa, toɠa ɓɔ è ʋa,
Wɛlɛ ɠimalai lɔɔzeigi ʋa: Ɠimalai ɠaiziɛ,
Bɔɔlɔ, toɠa è wuzeɠe,
Toɠa bɔɔlɔ pagɔi lɔ è unba,
Woilo dòun zunu, dàawooiti gaaɠa,
Gè è ɠalagɛ ga ɠimalai ma ʋelei,
Ni ɗa ɠɛna ziaa ɠana, è-ɠɔɠɔ zu la ɠataga,
Ɠili kpaan è maaɠolo vai ʋa, nii è sɔlɔɔgai, mina too ya,
Mina ziɛ ga nu ɲɔiti ta-ʋelei,
Maaɠooza ta-ʋelei ʋa, mina ziɛ la,
Mazɔlɔɔ faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nui naati, ti la ɲia, ni ti la faa ɲɔi ɠɛɛni,
Mazɔlɔɔ ti-ɠɔnɔgi ɠa ga faa ɲɔi,
Telebo nuiti ta-ʋelei ɠɛɛʋɛ eɠɛ, geelaalaosu wozakalagi,
Faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti ta-ʋelei ɠɛɛʋɛ eɠɛ kpidii,
Dòun zunu, woilo dàawooiti ma,
Mina yeema ti ma,
Mazɔlɔɔ niiti ti yeezeizu ti wu, ta ʋa ga zɛnvui naati pɔ,
Makɛ è-yii ma, é leʋe anii pɛ ba,
Mina ɓe è-laaʋɛ ʋa, é ʋa ɗa zɛɛiti bo,
Ɠaazulo ɠakala ʋelei ʋa,
Pelei zuɓɛtɛ, ʋɛ è ziɛzu ná,
È mina zeɠe ba, è ʋa li ga yeezazu ʋelei, ɓaa ɠɔʋɛzu ʋelei,
